system.description:
Connection - Gulp Missile. The user makes a Grapple Maneuver against a creature at least one size smaller than the user, with +10 per CatMod difference. On success, the user Engulfs the target, equpping the creature as a [Stash] item.The user can only have one creature Engulfed at a time. An Engulfed creature cannot act or be affected by actions or effects in any way, except to free itself with a -20 Grapple check.
When the user hits a target with an attack while it has an Engulfed creature, it deals a Tick of HP damage to the target. This damage possesses the Type(s) of the Engulfed creature.
If the user Faints, the Engulfed creature may freely escape if it chooses, appearing in a space adjacent to the user.
